author: Victoria Craw
title: Gordon Ramsay‚Äôs Twitter critiques are hilariously amazing
text:
HE‚ÄôS never been one to sugar coat things. 
Now chef Gordon Ramsay has taken his brutal critiques to a hilarious new level by replying to ambitious cooks on Twitter. And they can‚Äôt get enough of his withering reviews.
Check out some of the best, and by that we mean worst, below.
@GordonRamsay What do you think of my Buffalo wings? pic.twitter.com/XDQOB5N2ly 
‚Äî Ian Stephens (@IanStep6725) February 22, 2017 Hey @GordonRamsay visual quality good on my omelette? pic.twitter.com/TrQvwmB6i7 
‚Äî parker estes (@HeroicFalcon) February 21, 2017 @GordonRamsay , can you rate my mashed potato cheese on toast please. It's a family favourite. üòÅ pic.twitter.com/aOKvbNSH8Z 
‚Äî ashley nixon (@mod_1986) February 21, 2017 Did it just come back up ? https://t.co/zYimz63dI1 
‚Äî Gordon Ramsay (@GordonRamsay) February 21, 2017 Forking disgusting and that's just the avocado https://t.co/ZPi119Ex27 
‚Äî Gordon Ramsay (@GordonRamsay) February 20, 2017 Is that a dog chew Jordan ? https://t.co/oaD9o8e3l3 
‚Äî Gordon Ramsay (@GordonRamsay) February 20, 2017 Look for a new flat mate quick https://t.co/fX3yY78EkB 
‚Äî Gordon Ramsay (@GordonRamsay) February 20, 2017 Could you not hear your fire alarm ? https://t.co/FgrSHVX5A2 
‚Äî Gordon Ramsay (@GordonRamsay) February 20, 2017 Thick ! Congratulations with this much asparagus you now have see in the dark pee https://t.co/JkVRCfG4Eo 
‚Äî Gordon Ramsay (@GordonRamsay) February 20, 2017 Looks like toxic scum on a stagnant pool https://t.co/3Rf6s62Rgk 
‚Äî Gordon Ramsay (@GordonRamsay) February 19, 2017 He does occasionally give credit where it‚Äôs due, and a bit of culinary advice.
Yes yes yes https://t.co/6Xi8EjcgJJ 
‚Äî Gordon Ramsay (@GordonRamsay) February 20, 2017 Looks good Jennifer https://t.co/qyGuLPP2cg 
‚Äî Gordon Ramsay (@GordonRamsay) February 20, 2017 Ps Darren that's called spaghetti https://t.co/iOG5VZ1nPz 
‚Äî Gordon Ramsay (@GordonRamsay) February 20, 2017 But for the most part, it‚Äôs vintage Ramsay at his vitriolic best.
Never change, Gordon.
Have you been sick? https://t.co/07JrG3qn0e 
‚Äî Gordon Ramsay (@GordonRamsay) February 18, 2017 I'd rather wait for lunch https://t.co/GE9xR6NoAt 
‚Äî Gordon Ramsay (@GordonRamsay) February 18, 2017
